bilingual.source: It helps me plan what to do with it and have good spending habits.
bilingual.target: 这帮助我计划如何使用它并养成良好的消费习惯。

bilingual.source: The fund is used for discretionary spending on community projects.
bilingual.target: 该基金用于社区项目的自由决定的支出。

bilingual.source: He regretted spending money on trumpery instead of something useful.
bilingual.target: 他后悔把钱花在无价值的东西上，而不是有用的东西。

bilingual.source: I stopped using my credit card because I found I was spending excessively.
bilingual.target: 我不再用我的信用卡，因为我发现我花钱太没节制了。

bilingual.source: After spending years fretting (烦恼) over which toys to buy, and which apps to download.
bilingual.target: 在为买哪些玩具和下载哪些应用程序而烦恼多年之后。

bilingual.source: Finally, modern technology has changed my way of spending the free time that is provided by household appliances such as the dishwasher and the washing machine.
bilingual.target: 最后，现代科技改变了我利用洗碗机和洗衣机等家用电器提供的空闲时间的方式。

bilingual.source: Public spending to fight unemployment is still anathema;
bilingual.target: 用公共支出对抗失业的理念仍然遭到敌视；
戈登：我需要一些零用钱。
接下来我们说说个人承担的医疗费用。

yingyinNormal.en: When you say it in that tone, it implies that Luke and I haven't been spending quality time together. Which we have.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你用这种语气说出来，表明卢克和我没有好好共度父子亲密时光，其实是有的。

yingyinNormal.en: It means I'm spending more than an hour just preparing to enter the factory. But nothing can really prepare me for what I find inside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了准备进这家公司，我不止要花一个小时了，但是你在里面遇到的事，什么准备都是没有用的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if anyone's interested, I'll be spending this Valentine's Day the same way I spend every Valentine's Day. Buying a rotisserie chicken from the supermarket, taking it home, standing over the sink and eating it out of the package with my bare hands like an animal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，如果任何人有兴趣，今年的情人节我会像往年一样，从超市买只大烤鸡带回家，站在洗手池边像只禽兽一样直接打开包装用手抓着吃。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, tomorrow's Saturday. Saturday night is laundry night. So I'll be spending the preevning pre-sorting and pre-soaking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明天是周六，周六晚是洗衣夜，所以傍晚我会用来预分选衣物，并预浸湿。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, my quality father-son time was spending my adolescence looking out the window waiting for my dad to come back someday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我小时候美好的父子时光都用来盯着窗外，等我爸会不会回心转意回家来了。

yingyinNormal.en: There's just only so much time and energy in a single day, and I think we need to constantly be asking ourselves, "Am I spending it as wisely as I can?"
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是一天的时间和精力有限，我觉得我们该不断自省，“我是否尽可能明智地利用我的时间和精力了？”

yingyinNormal.en: Well, let's go 2-D. No sense in spending extra money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就看2D场吧。没必要多花钱。

yingyinNormal.en: And what else are we spending five bob on? What else are we spending six pence on?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在哪儿花过5先令? 还是在哪儿花过6便士?

yingyinNormal.en: Until I met you, I couldn't imagine spending my life with just one person and now I can't imagine spending one day of it without you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 遇到你之前，一生一爱，共度一生对我如同天方夜谭，而现在，分离一刻便有如生离死别。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, we ended up spending the day together and had such a great time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们整天泡在一起，玩得很开心

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, there's no point in spending time with someone if it's just fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果只是为了好玩，我们就不必交往了。

yingyinNormal.en: Spending all night talking to a woman who wasn't even there. Oh, shut up, you!
yingyinNormal.zh: 整晚对着一个不存在的女人说话。你闭嘴！

yingyinNormal.en: If you wanted me to stay out later, you should've given me more spending money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你想让我晚点回家，就应该给我多点零花钱啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, once, when I was 15, spending the summer at the Heidelberg institute in Germany.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一次，我15岁暑假的时候在德国的海德尔堡学院。

yingyinNormal.en: We're supposed to be spending a romantic weekend together, what is the matter with you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们出来是为了过浪漫周末，你到底哪里有毛病？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I guess with you doing the internship, we're spending more than we're bringing in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为你在做实习工作,我们花的比赚的还多。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, I've been dreaming about spending Valentine's Day with a girl since I was six.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？那我还从六岁起就梦想有朝一日有个女生能与我共度情人节呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you guys I just wanna say, I really really appreciate you spending this time with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的很谢谢你们来陪我。

yingyinNormal.en: It's just sometimes I feel like you enjoy spending time with your friends more than with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是有时候我觉得你更愿意和朋友在一起玩，而不是我。

yingyinNormal.en: We regret to inform you that you will be spending the next four years in New York with Maya.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们遗憾地通知你接下来的4年你将和玛雅一起在纽约度过！

exam_freq_info.chinese: 开支; 支出; 花销

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 用过的；失去效能的；耗尽的；精疲力竭的

word_family.mean: v. 用钱；花费；度过；用尽；耗尽；花钱；花时间

sense_info_list.zh: 开支; 支出; 花销

examination_example.sentence: The necessary amount of companies' <highlight>spending</highlight> on it is unknown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司在这方面的必要支出是未知的。

examination_example.sentence: First, consumers may take CSR <highlight>spending</highlight> as a "signal" that a company's products are of high quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，消费者可能会将CSR（企业社会责任）支出视为公司产品高质量的“信号”。

examination_example.sentence: The comprehensive <highlight>spending</highlight> review offers an opportunity for the government to help rectify this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全面支出审查为政府提供了一个帮助纠正这种情况的机会。
